item.description:
Bring family, friends, and neighbors to meet fellow Republicans at

Alpine Grove, 19 South Depot Road, Hollis, NH 03049

Sunday August 19 from 12:00-4:00 PM.

Hotdogs, hamburgers and all the fixings, and salad and unlimited soda will be provided.

Price is $18/person.
Make checks payable to HCRC and mail to:
Mrs. Gerry Porter, PO Box 542
Amherst, NH 03031-0542 by July 28.

Note: The campaign has purchased a display table and Ron Paul will be with us for this event!
Please buy your tickets in advance.
item.name: Hillsborough County Republican Committe BBQ
